keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure every child in Nottingham has a good or outstanding rated school
A bid to bring tram services back to our neighbourhood
Tackle knife and youth crime, reduce anti-social behaviour
For a not-for-profit energy company to fight poverty and get Nottingham people paying less for fuel bills
Guarantee a job placement for 18-24 year olds

issues.education: Ensure every child in Nottingham has a good or outstanding rated school

images.caption: Glyn Jenkins endorsing Saghir Mohammed for Labour Party

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on local constituency issues and does not extensively discuss broader policy areas. The key policy areas are highlighted in the leaflet as top pledges from Nottingham Labour.
